definitions.definition: To dwell permanently or for a considerable time; to have a settled abode for a time; to remain for a long time.
examples: He still resides at his parents' house.

definitions.definition: To have a seat or fixed position; to inhere ; to lie or be as in attribute or element .
To sink ; to settle , as sediment .

main_definition: To dwell permanently or for a considerable time; to have a settled abode for a time; to remain for a long time.
secondary_definitions: To have a seat or fixed position; to inhere ; to lie or be as in attribute or element .
To sink ; to settle , as sediment .
